    • selectRadioButton

      public void selectRadioButton(javafx.scene.control.RadioButton r1, javafx.scene.control.RadioButton r2, javafx.scene.control.RadioButton r3)
      Change background image of radio buttons. First argument will have selected radio button texture, other two not selected.
      Parameters:
      r1 - radio button to be selected
      r2 - radio button to be not selected
      r3 - radio button to be not selected

    • updateLevelsView

      public void updateLevelsView()
      Updates buttons and score table in level selection menu.

    • getPreview

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getPreview(String levelName, boolean savedGame, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)
      Make a level preview.
      Parameters:
      levelName - name of the level to display preview
      savedGame - true if level is of saved game type (in progress), false otherwise
      maxWidth - max width of preview
      maxHeight - max height of preview
      Returns:
      image of preview with chosen width and height, null in case of missing png file

    • deleteCreatedLevel

      public void deleteCreatedLevel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes created level file and screenshot from memory and form screen. Also deletes all in progress files which use selected level as reference.

    • editLevelTypeChanged

      Parameters:
      levelName - name of a new level
      baseLevelName - name of played level
      levelType - type of played level
      serverType - type of played server
